#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<utility>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<list>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#define ull unsigned long long
#define ll long long
#define F first
#define S second
#define MOD 1000000007
#define inf 1000000006
#define pb push_back
#define MAX 100002
#define REP(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define mp make_pair
#define CLEAR(a) memset(a,0,sizeof a)
#define pii pair< int , int >
#define piii pair< int , pii >
#define piiii pair< int, piii >
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,m,t;
    cin >> n >> m;
    int maxx =-1;
    REP(i,n){
             int minn = inf;
             REP(j,m){
                      cin >>t;
                      minn = min(minn,t);
                      }
                      maxx= max(maxx,minn);
                      }
                      cout<<maxx;
    return 0;
}
